name: MS Technology
tag_list: ecm, content-management, document-management, viewers, afp, document-conversion, sdks, html5
overview:
Founded in 1991 and headquartered in Charlotte, NC, MS Technology is one of the largest single source provider of imaging software development kits (SDKs), document and image viewers, and document converters. Imaging technology solutions include compression, DICOM, editing, OCR, PDF, scanning, annotating, redacting and viewing. Technology is delivered for Microsoft .NET, ActiveX, Silverlight, AJAX, ASP.NET, HTML5, IOS, Android, Windows Workflow, and Java environments. Multiple 32-bit and 64-bit platforms are supported, including Windows, Windows Mobile, Linux, Sun Solaris, Mac OSX, and IBM AIX.

MS Technology provides viewing technology to IBM for viewing and annotating documents from within IBM’s Content Manager 8 ECM. MS Technology also supports and manages IBM’s MO:DCA/AFP file formats for IBM.
